TopicTitle: BobCat Ind. - Colonization, exploring and research vehicle

Articles.Content:
Bobcat could you give a estimated release date on the cassowary? I am going to explode with anxiety! I would be willing to be a tester if necessary!

Never. Ask. For. A release date.

Bobcat could you give a estimated release date on the cassowary? I am going to explode with anxiety! I would be willing to be a tester if necessary!

No and no, release dates always no, testers, also no, Bobcat runs on his own schedule. No release dates
Sorry I did not know. I am pretty new to the forums. I promise it will not happen again.

what is this "cassowary" that so many people speak of? all I get when I google it, is some (pretty) bird. I do not see any spaceships/movie reference, book reference anywhere.

(just to be clear, I am not looking for the MOD itself, I am looking to understand what the mod would be OF)

Good parts as always (Y) Take it easy, he`s new here =)

Edited April 23, 2013 by ahappydude

what is this "cassowary" that so many people speak of? all I get when I google it, is some (pretty) bird. I do not see any spaceships/movie reference, book reference anywhere.

(just to be clear, I am not looking for the MOD itself, I am looking to understand what the mod would be OF)

It's a cargo plane thing Bobcat was working on, not sure if he still is though. (No Spaceship/Sci-fi reference)
And here I was worried that Bobcat left us. Good to know you are around.
are the HOME2(biom,living quarters) considered ground parts ? or..

1. ground parts yes

2. Cassowary in testing:

Also this thing is not small, it can fit the 3m HOME parts, I think that it can fit the DEMVs to.
it is rather large... but i thought that bobcat had stopped working on it

Bobcat could we possibly get some pictures on the cassowary's development? Or at least the old ones so that we could see it again. Thank you and i like so many others cant wait for the release of of this aesome mod you have created.

Bobcat could we possibly get some pictures on the cassowary's development? Or at least the old ones so that we could see it again. Thank you and i like so many others cant wait for the release of of this aesome mod you have created.

Here is the original design sketch, does this satisfy everyone?

[NOTE]: Finished production model designs may vary

YES!!!

Yesyesyesyesyes!

With that I will become death, destroyer of worlds!
Its amazing! How many Kerbals will it hold?
More than enough
It won't be released, stop talking about it and continue on actual stuff. Nothing new about H.O.M.E. 2 ?
Finished production model designs may vary

It won't be released, stop talking about it and continue on actual stuff. Nothing new about H.O.M.E. 2 ?

Hey everyone! It has come to my attention that the Cassowary has been completely cut from the future BobCat Ind. R&D projects because a random Belgian said so! Sorry to disappoint you all with false hopes, there is no Easter bunny, the toothfairy is dead and Santa Claus retired. Go cry in a corner now while BobCat Ind. now focuses on it's true calling and destiny...

BEAR WAFFLES.

Edited April 25, 2013 by chobit-389
Needed more emphasis

Hey everyone! It has come to my attention that the Cassowary has been completely cut from the future BobCat Ind. R&D projects because a random Belgian said so! Sorry to disappoint you all with false hopes, there is no Easter bunny, the toothfairy is dead and Santa Claus retired. Go cry in a corner now while BobCat Ind. now focuses on it's true calling and destiny...

BEAR WAFFLES.

Hasn't it be stated a few pages ago because it breaks the physX for now ?

That was a different ship we were talking about the Hercules (I believe).

However, I'm not really up to speed on Bobcat and co development.
;.;Fine. So whats next on bobcats list of amazing mods?

BEAR WAFFLES.

Ooh interesting, pics and release date pls, kthxbai.

BEAR WAFFLES.

And here I was thinking that picture was of a new bobcat, before the optimization and balancing passes.

there is no Easter bunny, the toothfairy is dead and Santa Claus retired. Go cry in a corner now while BobCat Ind. now focuses on it's true calling and destiny...
